messages.subject: Greek Mythology
messages.msgSnippet: I am not sure how much Greek Mythology this interactive, biofeedback game incorporates but it sounds and looks incredible. I heard about it last week at the
messages.messageBody:
I am not sure how much Greek Mythology this interactive,
biofeedback "game" incorporates but it sounds and looks incredible. I
heard about it last week at the Rethinking Education conference in
Texas. They have a sample of the graphics and game on their web site:
WildDivine.com. (sorry, I don't know how to post the site here
properly) It was reported to be enjoyed by both adults and a 4 year
old. We just ordered one for our family.
